thread.title: Graham Holdings Company Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
thread.title_full: Graham Holdings Company Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend

author: admin
title: Graham Holdings Company Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
text:
Graham Holdings Company 
ARLINGTON, Va. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Graham Holdings Company (NYSE: GHC) today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.15 per share, payable on November 6, 2015, to shareholders of record on October 19, 2015. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150910006372/en/ Copyright Â© Business Wire 2015
